description: Slovo, Journal of the Old Church Slavonic Institute publishes scientific and professional articles on paleoslavistic topics, especially on the Croatian Church Slavonic language, the Croatian medieval literature and the Croatian Glagolitic heritage (Glagolitic chanting, art history etc.). It also publishes book and journal reviews, necrologies and news. Year of publication of the first issue: 1952 frequency (annually): 1 Scientific areas: Humanities; History; Languages; Theology; Literature science; History of art; Rights: Full texts of the articles published in issues 1-60 are free and may be used for personal and educational purpose under conditions pertained to the copyrights of authors and the publisher. The previous issues may be obtained from the publisher.
